pullrequest.title: Fixed a typo in logging failures in the queue.

content.raw:
Ok. It looks like the queue manager did handle the exception as expected. It should have still been functional, just displayed the incorrect error message in the queue manager. This pull request effectively fixes that incorrect error message.

The hard crash seems to be due to restarting tabs, which I've seen before, but haven't tracked down to anything. I suspect it may be the implementation of [DragDropTab](#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/src/72f238ecd8fa9a297d90f72bb26a180dcfe2f95a/qtwidgets/dragdroptab.py?at=default) class which I wrote when I was very new to Qt. It should really be re-written at some point!
content.html:
Ok. It looks like the queue manager did handle the exception as expected. It should have still been functional, just displayed the incorrect error message in the queue manager. This pull request effectively fixes that incorrect error message.

The hard crash seems to be due to restarting tabs, which I've seen before, but haven't tracked down to anything. I suspect it may be the implementation of DragDropTab class which I wrote when I was very new to Qt. It should really be re-written at some point!
